title: Coco-pops! Girl's attempt to make a chocolate bowl using a balloon goes very messily wrong
text:
This is the moment an 11-year-old girl's attempt at making a chocolate bowl during a cooking tutorial goes hilariously wrong.

When Jersey Lockwood, 11, from Northumberland, called her mother to the kitchen for help, content creator Kerry, 39, had no idea what awaited her.

While Jersey had attempted to film her own chocolate bowl tutorial video in her home, the end result was not quite what she was hoping for.

Jersey Lockwood, (pictured) 11, from Northumberland, was attempting a cooking tutorial which involved covering a balloon in chocolate

As Jersey was in the process of covering a balloon with chocolate in order to create an edible bowl, the balloon dramatically burst, resulting in chocolate being splattered all over the kitchen and on Jersey's shocked face.

Jersey narrates the video herself, taking the viewers through the different steps needed to create the bowl.

She looks worried as she notices the mess it has created up the walls and calls out to her mother Kerry for help.

Kerry said: 'Jersey came into the living room where I was and she was covered in chocolate, my husband and I couldn't stop laughing!

The balloon bursts, resulting in chocolate being splattered all over the kitchen and on Jersey's shocked face (pictured)

She looks worried as she notices the mess it has created up the walls and calls out to her mother Kerry, 39, for help

'Jersey told us that it was all over the kitchen and when we went to take a look, we watched the video which made us laugh even more!

'Jersey was fine once she realised she wasn't in trouble!'
description: Jersey Lockwood, (pictured) 11, from Northumberland, was attempting a cooking tutorial which involved covering a balloon in chocolate.
